'''Ailinel''' was the second of the three children of [[Tar-Meneldur]] and [[Almarian]] of [[Númenor]].  Her older brother [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] later became King [[Tar-Aldarion]]; her younger sister was [[Almiel]].<ref name="Early">{{UT|earlier}}</ref>  Ailinel married [[Orchaldor]], who was descended from the [[House of Hador]] and they had a son named [[Soronto]].<ref name="Wife">{{UT|Wife}}</ref> 

==Etymology==
''Ailinel'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but [[Helge Fauskanger]] suggests it means "Lake-woman" or something similar and consists of the elements ''[[ailin]]'' ("lake") + the feminine suffix ''[[-iel]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=https://folk.uib.no/hnohf/quen-eng.htm|articlename='''ailin'''|website=Quettaparma Quenyallo|accessed=26 January 2022}}</ref>
